TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWcfReferenceReceiveContextInformation

summary.span: 定义要为获取附加上下文信息而实现的接口。

span.span: Defines the interface to implement to obtain additional context information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口允许 WSDL 导入程序 mechanismto 接收额外的上下文信息来更好的代理生成和更好的开发人员体验在 Visual Studio 中。This interface enables the WSDL importer mechanismto receive extra context information for better proxy generation and a better developer experience inside Visual Studio. 如果 WSDL 导入程序实现接口，`ReceiveImportContextInformation`方法将调用的任何方法之前的 WCF 代理生成器和调用。If the WSDL importer implements the interface, the `ReceiveImportContextInformation` method will be called by the WCF proxy generator before any methods of and are called. 其他上下文信息引用的参数传递给`ReceiveImportContextInformation`方法。The additional context information refers to the parameters passed to the `ReceiveImportContextInformation` method. 参数包括任何扩展名为的文件和对实现的对象的引用的内容接口。The parameters include the content of any extension files and a reference to an object that implements the interface. 传递给方法的任何扩展文件特定于导入程序，用于存储所需的任何其他信息。Any extension files passed to the method are specific to the importer and are used to store any additional information they need. 也就是说，Visual Studio 不控制这些文件的内容并不直接使用它们。That is, Visual Studio does not control the content of these files and does not use them directly. > [!NOTE] > 导入程序指 WCF 可扩展性机制。Importers refer to a WCF extensibility mechanism. 此机制，可自定义元数据 (WSDL/XSD) 文档，用于描述该服务从生成代理代码的方式。This mechanism enables you to customize the way proxy code is generated from metadata (WSDL/XSD) documents that describe the service. 有关详细信息，请参阅[导入 WCF 扩展的自定义元数据](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92310)MSDN 上。For more information, see [Importing Custom Metadata for a WCF Extension](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92310) on MSDN.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ReceiveImportContextInformation (System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,byte[]> serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReceiveImportContextInformation(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, unsigned int8[]> serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Sub ReceiveImportContextInformation (serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents As IDictionary(Of String, Byte()), serviceProvider As IServiceProvider)

public: void ReceiveImportContextInformation(System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, cli::array <System::Byte> ^> ^ serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);
abstract member ReceiveImportContextInformation : System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, byte[]> * IServiceProvider -> unit

param.name: serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents
param.span: 提供与 WCF 服务引用的 .svcmap 文件相关联的任何扩展文件的内容。

span.span: Provides the content of any extension files that are associated with the .svcmap file of a WCF service reference.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 对 Visual Studio 服务提供程序的引用，用于查询附加信息的。

span.span: A reference to a Visual Studio service provider to be queried for additional information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents`参数提供的与 WCF 服务引用，如 Reference.config 或已通过扩展性添加的自定义扩展插件文件.svcmap 文件相关联的任何扩展文件的内容。The `serviceReferenceExtensionFileContents` parameter provides the content of any extension files associated with the .svcmap file of a WCF service reference, such as Reference.config or custom extension files that have been added through extensibility. > [!NOTE] > 在 ASP.NET 生成提供程序的上下文中运行时，从特定于 Visual Studio 服务提供程序接收任何接口将无法供导入扩展。Any interface received from the service provider that is specific to Visual Studio will not be available to an import extension when running in the context of an ASP.NET build provider. WCF 服务引用编译的 ASP.NET 项目时，这是这种情况。This is the case when a WCF service reference is compiled in an ASP.NET project.
